title: Mapy
content:
Tato stránka simply provides links to the various maps in the game in an organized manner for ease of searching. Při hledání svého dalšího cíle sleduj ukazatel na "minimapě". Mapu otevřeš kliknutím na ikonu mapy nebo stiskem klávesy M.
Obecné informace
Prolog | Kapitola I | Kapitola II | Kapitola III | Kapitola IV | Kapitola V | Epilog
Cena neutrality | Vedlejši účinky	
Obecné informace

Mapy come in very handy in the course of the game, especially when it comes to figuring out where you are at any given point vis-à-vis where you want to go. Locations of interest, once they've been found or described, appear on the various maps as markers. There are several markers, below is a quick reference chart of the various markers used in the game:

	
	First and foremost, the player marker, you, or Geralt if you prefer.
	Znak pro Ohniště. Když objevíte ohniště, automaticky se zanese do mapy.
	Značka pro Kruh živlů.
	Místa marker, these appear when some on-screen messages announcing a new named area appear, not all areas appear as dots, some merely appear as labels when moused over.
	NPC marker, light green markers indicate characters like kupci and Kováři. Not all NPCs get their own marker, and some get no marker at all.
	Znak Místa moci.
	Úkol marker, these red markers indicate the next místa to explore. They disappear when the quest, or phase is complete. They are not necessarily triggered by quest tracking.
	Úkol NPC marker, these little white markers indicate characters of more importance than regular NPCs in the current quest. One example is Berengar in the crypt, he gets this marker. They disappear when the quest is complete, usually.

This module uses the same maps as the main game, but only the Chrámová čtvrť, Cemetery and (parts of) the Sewers are included.
